coordinator.technical_notes: Session continuation: Created, reviewed, and approved all 5 setup improvement tasks. TASK-SETUP-001 revised after architectural discussion - clarified adversarial-workflow as core layer with agent coordination as extension layer (not parallel system). Command: 'adversarial-workflow agent onboard' (namespace + verb pattern). All 5 tasks approved: TASK-SETUP-003 (fix check, 2.5h - COMPLETED by feature-dev), TASK-SETUP-002 (preflight script, 5h - IN PROGRESS), TASK-SETUP-001 (agent onboard, 8h - revised and approved), TASK-SETUP-005 (package guide, 3-5h), TASK-SETUP-004 (health check, 8h). Total effort: ~26.5-28.5 hours. Strategic planning complete: package separation (v0.4.0+), smoother aider install (combination approach), documentation standards (verbified command format).

feature-developer.technical_notes: TASK-SETUP-005 completed in ~2 hours (under 3-5h estimate). Simple packaging task: (1) Copied 34KB guide to templates/agent-context/. (2) Updated pyproject.toml to include templates/agent-context/* in package data. (3) Added 9 lines to cli.py init() to copy guide if template exists. (4) Updated QUICK_START.md documentation. (5) Tested successfully in temp directory. Guide now automatically copied during 'adversarial init', fully offline-capable, no network dependency. Skipped optional features (fallback download, version check, update command) - simpler implementation, YAGNI principle. 3 tasks completed total (TASK-SETUP-002, 003, 005). Ready for TASK-SETUP-004 (health check command, 8h, builds on check() pattern) or TASK-SETUP-001 (agent onboard wizard, 8h, interactive setup).
